intro: Zwaardekronia, commonly known as the golden crown. It is a flowering plant native to South Africa, characterized by its striking yellow flowers that resemble a crown. The plant belongs to the family Aizoaceae, also known as the ice plant family. It thrives in arid and rocky environments, showcasing its adaptability to harsh conditions. Its unique appearance and resilience make it a popular choice for rock gardens and drought-tolerant landscapes.
